name: Lara Spence Web Design
description: Lara Spence Web Design is a Vancouver BC Web Design & Business Writing company offering full digital marketing services including SEO-ready web copy, fully responsive WordPress + Shopify websites (eCommerce and not), SEO services, PPC, Social Media marketing + advertising, website maintenance, logo design, brochure / Customer Story writing, and more! Wild Apricot membership site consultants too.
